releasenote.desc: moved area of more details of selected image to the right of keyword(tags) input area.
implemented real-time search function with ng-keyup directive.
once starting adjusting content of keys(tags) input area, area of more tails of selected image will be inexhibited.
added auto-retrieved latest version info, release note and ToDo list.
adjusted padding space of table cells.
made adjustable height of area shared by release note, todo list and more details of selected image.
differentiated even and odd rows of table inside shared area for better visual effect.
improved user-friendliness: for an overflown div shatred by release note, todo list and details of selected image, assure latest, important info shown on top.
fixed common area atop the screen while scrolling thumbnails.
moved AngularJS from v1.2.0 back to 1.1.5 to enable thumbnail functionality under MS IE Edge (v11).
